title: Node.js Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Node.js and build scalable and efficient backend applications using JavaScript.

title: RESTful API Development with Express
description: Master the concepts of building RESTful APIs using Express.js and create robust backend services for web applications.

title: Database Design and Management
description: Gain a deep understanding of database design principles and learn how to effectively manage databases for backend development.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Explore different authentication and authorization techniques to secure backend APIs and protect user data.

title: Serverless Architecture with AWS Lambda
description: Learn to build scalable and cost-effective backend applications using serverless architecture with AWS Lambda.

title: Building RESTful APIs with Django
description: Discover how to create RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework for efficient backend development.

title: Real-Time Applications with WebSocket
description: Learn to develop real-time applications using WebSocket to enable bidirectional communication between clients and servers.

title: Microservices Architecture with Docker and Kubernetes
description: Explore the microservices architecture and learn to deploy containerized applications with Docker and Kubernetes.
